badges.name: ChatBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge when a player sends a chat message

badges.name: ClickBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge when a player clicks an object or UI

badges.name: CreatorBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge to the game creator

badges.name: DailyLoginBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge for logging in on multiple days

badges.name: DiedBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge when a player dies for the first time

badges.name: FriendsJoinedBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge when a friend joins the same server

badges.name: GamepassBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge when a player owns a specific gamepass

badges.name: GroupBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge for being in a Roblox group

badges.name: KillsBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge when a player reaches a kill milestone

badges.name: LevelsBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge when a player reaches a certain level

badges.name: PartBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge when a player touches a specific part

badges.name: PromptBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge after a proximity prompt is triggered

badges.name: TimeBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge after the player plays for a set amount of time

badges.name: WelcomeBadge
badges.description: Awards a badge when a player joins the game
